name: PathCubes
description:
Challenge Your Memory with this Fun Brain Game

HOW TO PLAY:
Get to the goal by remembering which tiles are safe and which are not. By remembering the safe tiles, you will lead the cube to the final and earn your points!

FEATURES:
* Very straightforward and easy game-play with challenging memory levels
* 60 fun levels are available to improve your memory skills
* Great brain exercise for all ages!
* Google Play Leaderboard
